altername_name: Zhong Guo Xiang Qi Chinese Chess
Zhōng Guó Xiàng Qí Chinese Chess
name: Zhong Guo Xiang Qi Chinese Chess
overview: Zhong Guo Xiang Qi Chinese Chess (中国象棋 CHINESE CHESS), known more commonly just as Chinese Chess, is an unlicensed Sega Mega Drive game released in Taiwan. It should not be confused with Zhong Guo Xiang Qi by Realtec.
